wikitext.*:
'''''ampa''''' is a noun meaning "hook" in [[Quenya]].<ref name="Names">{{App|Letters}}, Note, ''The names of the letters''</ref>

[[Image:Ampa.gif|left]]''Ampa'' is also the name in Quenya of the fourteenth letter of the [[Tengwar]] alphabet.<ref name="Names"/>   It is the second letter of the fourth grade or [[Tyellë]], which contains "voiced spirants", and it is the fourth letter of the series of labial consonants, the ''[[Parmatéma]]''.<ref name="Letters">{{App|Letters}}</ref>  In standard Quenya spelling ''Ampa'' represents '''MP'''<ref name="Names"/> but in all other modes it represents '''V'''.<ref name="Letters"/>  The Westron name for this letter is '''''Ivi'''''.<ref>See ''[[Alphabet of Fëanor: Numenian, or Westron, Mode]]''</ref>
